Project

diversitydatakids.org is a comprehensive research program to monitor the state of wellbeing, diversity, opportunity and equity of U.S. children. 

Affiliation

diversitydatakids.org is housed at the Institute for Child, Youth and Family Policy at the Heller School for Social Policy and Management at Brandeis University.

Funding

diversitydatakids.org is funded by the W.K. Kellogg Foundation and the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation.
